assetProfile.address2: 22nd Floor, Block B No. 1 Financial Street Xicheng District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: CNPC Capital Company Limited operates as a financial company in China. It is involved in the banking business comprising absorbing public deposits, and handling domestic and foreign settlements, and bill acceptance and discounting, as well as issuing short-term, medium-term, and long-term loans; financial leasing, including direct financial leasing, sale and leaseback, project leasing, equipment export leasing, manufacturer leasing, etc.; trust business, such as financing trust, securities investment, equity investment trusts, real estate trusts, funded trusts, etc.; and insurance business, including life, health, accident, and other insurance, as well as the reinsurance. The company also engages in the insurance brokerage business comprising risk management consulting, insurance plan design, insurance arrangement, assistance in claims, reinsurance brokerage, disaster prevention and loss prevention, and other businesses., as well as risk assessment, survey and inspection, loss adjustment, and residual value processing; and digital business. In addition, it is involved in securities brokerage, securities investment consulting, financial consulting related to securities trading and securities investment activities, securities underwriting and sponsorship, securities proprietary trading, and securities assets, as well as management, margin financing and securities lending, agency sales of securities investment funds and financial products, management of publicly offered securities investment funds, etc. Further, the company offers fixed income investment, project investment, corporate credit enhancement, credit products, asset management, investment consulting, and other services. The company was formerly known as Jinan Diesel Engine Co., Ltd. and changed its name to CNPC Capital Company Limited in February 2017. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Beijing, China. CNPC Capital Company Limited is a subsidiary of China National Petroleum Corporation.
